property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The custom width (in points) for using the custom paper.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The custom height (in points) for using the custom paper.

property.name: offset
property.shortdesc: Custom offset (in points) for using the custom paper.

property.name: transverse
property.shortdesc: Whether to transverse the artwork (rotate 90 degrees) on the custom paper.
